[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column][vc_banner_title style=”big” color_style=”light” subtitle=”VOROHTA, UKRAINE” title=”Awesome Design for the Vorokhta Hub” img=”15″ button=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.themedemo.co/prague%2Fwork-grid%2F|title:EXPLORE%20IT|target:%20_blank|” style_button=”creative” enable_overlay=”true” enable_fullheight=”true” columns=”%5B%7B%7D%5D”]The main objective of the project – transformation of Vorokhta City in innovative

SMART CITY (village) and tourist center.[/vc_banner_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-140t” tablets_mt=”margin-sm-70t”][vc_column width=”2/3″ desctop_mt=”margin-lg-65t” tablets_mt=”margin-sm-0t” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-5 vc_col-sm-offset-2 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_counters image_background=”191″ border_size=”15px” numbers=”%5B%7B%22number%22%3A%2214%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22YEARS%20OF%20EXPERIENCE%22%7D%5D”][/vc_column][vc_column tablets_mt=”margin-sm-20t” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_headings subtitle=”ABOUT US” title=”Break out of your routine with
a global perspective.” enable_animated=”true”]Based on collective work and shared knowledge, Architecture-Studio aims to favour dialogue and debate, to transform individual knowledge into increased creative potential.

Our Studio is a architecture practice based in Prague, Chech and Venice. Today, it includes 150 architects, urban planners, landscape and interior designers of 25 different nationalities. The company principle of Architecture-Studio is the collective conception. From the very beginning, the practice has believed in the virtues of exchange, crossing ideas, common effort, shred knowledge.[/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-15t” tablets_mt=”margin-sm-20t”][vc_column][vc_headings subtitle=”LAST PROJECTS” title=”Make it with passion.”][/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-30t” tablets_mt=”margin-sm-20t”][vc_column][vc_projects_posts templates=”list” post_type=”projects” image_original_size=”full” button_link_class=”prague-services-link a-btn-2 simple” button_span_class=”a-btn-line” posts_per_page=”6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-0t”][vc_column][vc_headings subtitle=”TESTIMONIALS” title=”They love us.”][/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-10t” desctop_mb=”margin-lg-145b” tablets_mb=”margin-sm-70b”][vc_column][vc_testimonials autoplay=”3000″ speed=”2000″ loop=”true”][vc_testimonials_items name=”Mark Eganberg” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][vc_testimonials_items name=”Jennifer Hilbertson” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][vc_testimonials_items name=”Lesley Grand” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][vc_testimonials_items name=”John Frick” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][/vc_testimonials][/vc_column][/vc_row]
